dialogue.text: An unpleasant, bass voice came from a massive silhouette.

dialogue.name: Weird Silhouette
dialogue.text: Kid, save your voice, you're screaming like you're being cut.

dialogue.name: Weird Silhouette
dialogue.text: I'm the tooth fairy. Someone, I reckon it's you, has lost a tooth, so I've come to collect it. And anyway, I'm not so scary, that you need to scream like that. It's rude, punk.
